title: Big Nate: What Could Possibly Go Wrong?
description: Now an animated series from Paramount + & Nickelodeon! Big Nate, the star of the New York Times bestselling book series, is also the star of his own comic strip! This comic collection includes over 300 black-and-white Big Nate comic strips, and bonus Big Nate activities in the back! Will Nate get away with his master plan? Or will Mrs. Godfrey catch him in the act? Find out what happens next! The activities are brand-new for Big Nate fans! Diary of a Wimpy Kid author Jeff Kinney says, "Big Nate is funny, big time!"
author: Lincoln Peirce
